title: Which Roman legion killed Jesus Christ? - Quora

response.answer_text: None. Jesus’ arrest and execution were performed by auxiliary forces. Unlike Mr Wallace claims, there was no legion stationed in Judea. They would be either in Syria or Egypt and would only show up in the area if there was trouble (such as the Jewish Wars).
The Sanhedrin had Jesus killed by convincing Pontius Polite to crucify him. If Pilate didn’t do as they said, then there would be an uprising by the Jews who wanted Christ crucified.
